description: Custom coat fitting and warm outfit options to keep your dog comfortable in the cold.
Professional grooming with moisturizing paw balm and winter-safe shampoo to protect from cold, ice and salt.

serviceName: Indoor Warm-Zone Kennel for Small Pets
description: Overnight or day-stay in our heated indoor warm-zone to keep small pets safe and snug during winter chill.

serviceName: Anti-Freeze Salt Paw Rinse & Wax Treatment
description: After-walk paw rinse to remove ice-melt salts plus paw-wax application to bar snow/ice build-up between pads.

serviceName: Cold Weather Coat Check & Skin Moisture Spa
description: Check for under-coat health & apply hydrating pet-safe skin balm to protect thin-coated or senior pets against winter dryness.

serviceName: Winter Outdoor Walk Supervision & Booties Service
description: Supervised short winter outdoor walks including booties or dog-boot rental, to keep your pet active but safe in icy conditions.

serviceName: Cat Winter Indoor Play & Warm-Bed Setup
description: Indoor play time plus warm-bed setup for cats during cold months; we install heated pads and snug corners.

serviceName: Senior Dog Warm-Floor Rest Area & Monitoring
description: Setup heated rest-floor zones for senior dogs, monitor mobility in colder weather, apply joint-safe supplements (non-medicinal).

serviceName: Bird Aviary Cold-Draft Proofing & Heating Setup
description: We check outdoor aviaries or winter bird houses, install safe heaters, cover drafts and ensure water doesn't freeze.
